tool.name: CD-HIT-OTU-MiSeq
tool.description: CD-HIT-OTU-MiSeq for paired end fastq files

repeat.name: group1
repeat.title: FASTQ file for sample
repeat.help: You can add up to 20 samples

param.name: group1_name
param.label: Please enter a unique sample ID

tool.help:
Summary: This workflow runs CD-HIT-OTU-MiSeq workflow for up 20 samples. The input must be paired ended (PE) fastq files for each sample.
For each sample, the workflow run the following process: 1. QC, the low quality reads will be removed and low quality bases will be trimmed 2. OTU clustering
All samples will be pooled and will be clustering into OTUs
Input: 1. PE fastq files (2 files) for each sample click "add new FASTQ file for sample" to add a new sample select a group for the sample and give a unique sample name
Output: 1. OTU clusters for each sample 2. OTU clusters for pooled samples
